attributes.action: Ban resale of ps5 over rrp on ebay gumtree and Facebook
attributes.additional_details: To help out people that were unfortunate enough to not get a ps5 at release due to illegal purchasing via bots
attributes.background: Ban resale of ps5 over rrp on ebay gumtree and Facebook

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions calling for actions relating to specific products, but we have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign: 

Prevent/deter the buying and reselling of goods/services at inflated prices: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/561986
